title: Vocabulary Words
description: A schema for a collection of vocabulary words, each with a definition, teacher-friendly definition, pronunciation, part of speech, and exactly five example sentences with corresponding image descriptions for educational use.

WORDS.description: An array of vocabulary word objects.

DEFINITION.description: The formal definition of the word.

PRONUNCIATION.description: The phonetic pronunciation of the word.

PART_OF_SPEECH.description: The part of speech of the word (e.g., noun, verb, adjective).

EXAMPLES.description: Exactly five example sentences demonstrating the word's usage, each with an image description for classroom visualization.

sentence.description: An example sentence using the vocabulary word.

image_description.description: A detailed description of an image that visually represents the example sentence.
